title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A story of decadence and excess, Gatsby explores the American Dream in the Jazz Age.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

title: The Fellowship of the Ring
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The first volume of the epic high-fantasy novel that follows Frodo Baggins and the Fellowship.

title: The Two Towers
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The second volume continues the journey as the Fellowship is broken and new alliances form.

title: The Return of the King
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The epic conclusion to the trilogy as the fate of Middle-earth hangs in the balance.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Set in the distant future, this epic tale of politics, religion, and ecology unfolds on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A philosophical novel about a young shepherd's journey to find treasure and discover his Personal Legend.

title: Beloved
author: Toni Morrison
description: A powerful exploration of the lasting trauma of slavery through the story of Sethe and her family.
